description: Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of Planning Permission Ref: 11/02200/FUL (Demolition of the existing building.  Redevelopment of site to provide a mix use development involving employment office space (Use Class B1), 328 bedrooms for student accommodation (Sui Generis) and 38 self-contained residential flats (Use Class C3).  Erection of two buildings on the site, consisting of one 6-storey building plus part basement (residential flats) and one part 8, part 7, part 5-storey building plus basement (student accommodation and employment office space), together with a lift overrun.  Provision of refuse, recycling and cycle storage facilities along with landscaping of the existing site and associated private amenity space for the residential units) Granted on 07.10.2011The variation would seek to allow a minor material amendment to the approved scheme.
